website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set of 4 K-Cups with a user-friendly design that's versatile enough for most Keurigs, easy to use and maintain, and backed by an impressive guarantee.
pros: Stands out for its lifetime guarantee that protects against issues
Few problems with spills or leaks when brewing compared to some other models
cons: Fits most – but not all – Keurigs
May require filling to the top if you prefer strong coffee

customer_reviews.title: EVERY KEURIG OWNER NEED THESE!
customer_reviews.text: This product alone has made it to the point where I live my KEURIG machine more than I thought possible. I never liked the prices of the K cups, not to mention all of the trash they created! When I found these I ordered them right away and haven’t bought a k cup since. They are made strong and have held up great the last month and a half we’ve been using them. I rotate them daily and they don’t seem to have any wear as of yet! They are extremely easy to clean and great for the environment, you won’t be sorry you tried them.
customer_reviews.author: MyThreeKBsTV

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with K-Mini
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description saying these work in the K-Mini, it does not! The only way to get it to fit is to take out the original pod holder. Water sprays all over and leaks when running through. Now to find out, it is not returnable! Not a very good experience!
customer_reviews.author: MW RN

customer_reviews.title: Combine this reusable filter with a paper filter and you're close to coffee heaven.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful reusable coffee filters for our K-cup machine. Buying the individual K-cups can be expensive so this is the perfect answer for us. We buy whole beans and grind them ourselves then put that coffee into a throw-away paper filter placed inside this mesh filter. The coffee tastes great and you still get the convenience of one cup at a time. When the cup is brewed you just throw out the grounds and the paper filter and rinse off this reusable filter. Nothing could be easier. Comes four in a pack in case you want to have one cup brewing while you prepare another.......a coffee assembly line.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Cutting the cost for a cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: If you are tire of spending a lot of money for prepackaged single cup of coffee grinds for single cup coffee makers, this product is for you. You can use any type of ground coffee you like and buying coffee by the pound is certainly cheaper than buying it by the cup. You can juse this product just the way it is but it gets a little messy getting the used grounds out of the container. I buy EZ filters which make it very easy to clean up after use. You don't need them but as I said it's so easy to pull them out and throw them, with the grounds in it, in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Stettler

customer_reviews.title: Lids break off
customer_reviews.text: They are less than three months old, and the lids have broken off on all four of them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not brew the same potency
customer_reviews.text: The K Cup works well but they do not brew at the same potency because they have netting mesh around 360 and at the bottom of the K Cup. My coffee taste a little bit watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea A

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of filters. I wanted to reduce waste and save money, so I started looking into a Keurig pod filter. I went straight to the source and bought the Keurig brand pod filter. The Keurig brand did not fit the my model. Can you believe that? I came across these reusable pods filters on Amazon and they work great. I do not under or over fill them. They brew great, allow me to easily change and mix my coffee flavors. Cleaning them is a snap. The used grounds could be saved for composting. This is a great green option. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Lattimore

customer_reviews.title: Its good until you want to close it....
customer_reviews.text: The thing with these pods is they come close in the package but once you open them, they will not stay close... so when you store them or wash them, they will basically stay open as you see on the photo. The chances of them getting damaged is way higher and if you have a rack to store your pods, you guessed it, you cant store these because the lid wont stay shut. Would not recommend because of it, they just dont snap shut. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer 8

customer_reviews.title: Can use my favorite local coffee in these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I drink different kinds of coffee, so it’s awesome to be able to make him a mug with his preference and use another cup for my own blend. For easy cleaning, we open the lid and lightly bang the cup on the inside of the garbage can—this will empty most of the grounds, but a chopstick is helpful in cleaning out anything that sticks. Feels good to use these reusable cups instead of contributing more plastic into the ocean with disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my small Keurig
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews complaining about this. I don’t know why people had such issues with it. It fits perfectly in my compact Keurig. It is easy to get in and out - it has grooves for where to place it. It’s easy to clean. It works months later. I have only used one basket so far. I don’t use it every day but frequently enough. Works great for me. I put some loose tea in the container, close it and place it where the grooves say to and I get lovely flavored tea. I use it empty if I want hot water. It works great for me. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MonyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and
customer_reviews.text: Reviews on here have said that the top won't stay shut but that is true if you don't properly clean the rim at the top before shutting it. I've had that happen a few times. But I just put it in the Keurig and shut the top down and it shuts with it. These are simple to clean and I am happy that I got them because I just couldn't keep using single-use plastic anymore. Not only for the environment, but because of the toxic BPA you drink after plastic is heated.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: If you like your coffee watered down, this is the item for you. Its a simple concept really. When brewing coffee in a K-Cup or a regular coffee maker, the water/coffee funnels out a small hole. This allows the water to mix with the grounds at a slow proper pace giving you a much needed coffee flavor. When you use this product, the entire bottom and sides are a filter. The water comes out way too fast to soak up any of the coffee grounds and wala, you have your watered down coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Squatty J

customer_reviews.title: Read this if keurig 2.0
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been working really well. If you have a keurig 2.0 what you will have to do is cut the top off of a used keurig brand K cup to place on top of these for them to work. The new 2.0 read the label to see if it’s third party or not and this allows you to use the cups. I fill it about halfway with coffee and then run it. Once done, open it up and it comes right out when you wash it in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haws

customer_reviews.title: Saves money
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I literally have two weeks' worth of them and I make them up in advance and find them to be nearly as easy as the store-bought disposable Kcups (just a quick cleanup afterwards) and way more cost effective, especially if you drink two cups a day, as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Ritamar

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for months now, and they have held up well. I purchased the 4 pack, and I am still using my first one ! every now and then some grounds slip by and end up in my mug, I blame me for that as I probably over filled it ! not the filters fault. You will be happy with these too.
customer_reviews.author: r fraser

customer_reviews.title: Do not order. It only holds half the amount of grinds as a regular adaptor
customer_reviews.text: If you like really weak coffee this is for you. The amount of grounds this can hold is about half of what is held in the stock Keurig adaptor that is provided with the machine. To make it worse they have hollowed out the bottom to make it hold even less coffee that it looks like in the pictures. Do not buy. If you need it for tea it will work but for coffee you will be brewing a clear cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: worked well even with a tea bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, i can see why they give you a few, i cant see the little plastic latch lasting too long, but all the brands i have seen are desgigned similar. It works good i tried with dunkin coffee and even shoved a tea ba inside and it brewed with no problem, did not overflow or leak around where you place the brew cup inside.
customer_reviews.author: DAMAN21

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, great for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Very sturdy for everyday use. Have saved me from the daily expense and refuse of kcups. I can use my own coffee and then dump the grounds into my compost, something that was too difficult to do with the kcups. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Carder

customer_reviews.title: Works with my Keurig machine!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, bought these since the lid on my old one broke off. Exactly like the old one, works well. Just wish I could only buy one or two, but now I have some for replacements or to share with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Clean up nicely though. Haven't I used more than 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work very well for the keurig. Coffee was weak tasting when using regular coffee. Should I have used special coffee? Difficult to snap open and closed. Clean up nicely though. Haven't I used more than 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Not A Fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mom. We did not like the quality - the caps were flimsy; nor did they fit properly in her K-Select machine for some reason. I ended up sending them back and purchasing the stainless steel cups instead. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed this was so easy to use. No assembly or disassembly required. Just fill it with your coffee, pop it in your Keurig and you're done. Works with most original Keurig machines. I like the ability to use ground coffee because there are more flavors available and it's less expensive than buying the Kcups. Lasts longer too. I'm not sure how long this will hold up under regular use but so far I love it. Good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: CottonCandy86

customer_reviews.title: Keurig  sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! They all broke in a matter of no time! Do yourself a favor buy a quality coffee machine with a reusable filter and stick with that. I recommend Hamilton Beach, FlexPro. Every Keurig i've ever purchased ended up breaking after a couple years. Save yourself the money there's better products out there!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: These work well... IF you can manage to mash down the lid every single time! Due to the needle inside (where the k-cups go to poke holes in them) it causes it not to fit properly and will sometimes even jump out at you (no joke). Yes I made sure these fit my specific keurig before purchasing. I still use them but with the same fear as playing with a jack-in-the-box.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with the paper filter insert. When I finish my cup of coffee I don’t have dregs in the bottom of the cup. Easy to use and the cups handle the paper filters very well.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Freasier

customer_reviews.title: For the environmentally aware and penny conscious
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is perfect! And the package comes with four of them. Even all thumbs, make a mess male uses it with ease to brew his favorite coffee which doesn't appear to come in Kcups. This saves pennies on the purchase of kcups (he uses probably 8/day plus the shipping to get them here every third day or so and the disposal thereof.
customer_reviews.author: milchoice

customer_reviews.title: Reusable cup works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the new Keurig which did not fit my old reusable cake up. I had to buy this new type which works fine but the coffee maker itself makes a much weaker cup of coffee even when using the strong brew option. Really weak.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sheldrick

customer_reviews.title: These reusable filters fit my old model Keurig
customer_reviews.text: After buying a set of reusable filters at a big box store only to get home and find out that they were too large to fit in my Keurig, which is a very early version of the product, I was desperate to find some filters that would work. Although it wasn't possible to gauge their size via a website photo, I took the chance and bought a box of these because the promo indicated they would match up with my Keurig's mode number. I was delighted when they arrived and found that they would work.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. Not sure why some folks have issues with this product, it's not rocket science. Use 2 level tablespoons of coffee. Brush off any lose coffee on the rim. Close it. Use it. Empty coffee grounds after use. Rinse thoroughly in hot water and let it air dry. You don't have to scrub it or put it in the dishwasher - it's coffee - not meat. I have used this every day for almost a month and not one issue.
customer_reviews.author: nyc shoe gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I have the first keurig model eight the three buttons and it fits great and works great. Great price they give u 4. But it’s durable so I probably need to replace it if it breaks which I doubt
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The holes in these dont line up so the Keurig needle wont go through them and water goes everywhere. Lots of the time I cant even get the Keurig handle to close all the way when using these. Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Blessing on my life
customer_reviews.text: THIS. THIS CREATION. THIS HAS CHANGED MY LIFE. Every day now I get amazing fresh coffee, it is life-changingly good and so impossibly easy to clean. A few taps and all of the coffee grounds are out, rinse with hot water and bam! Clean. I soak in water and vinegar for a deep clean as well. This comes with four!!!! Four!!! Which means even if everyone in your house uses one you won’t have any issues. I love quality coffee and this has handed that to me on a golden platter.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT work with 2.0 Keurig machines & not returnable
customer_reviews.text: These do not work with the newer designs of Keurig machines; they don’t fit with the drip head. Even if your machine is listed in the model list, make sure you have the older type before ordering. Also these cups are not returnable to Amazon. Major bummer. Also they don’t last long, either the filter mess rips or the lids break off. That’s why it’s a pack of 4.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost two years ago and I'm just using my third cup (one more left). These are durable, reusable and work very well. I like to make a large mug of coffee and use it more than once for the brew. You have to move the grounds around in the cup since it will channel. I would imagine that happens with every K-cup. Anyway, these things are great if you want to use your own coffee with a Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought these and moved away from traditional K cups! They are easy to use/clean, fit our Keurig Latte machine. No issues here!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two refillable pods that I bought at Walmart within the last 4 months. That brand HAS to go into the Keurig in a specific way or else it pops a hole through the screen, which leads to grounds getting into your coffee cup. I really like these pods because it doesn't matter which way they go in, so if my daughter makes me coffee there's no worry she might poke a hole in it. No more drinking coffee grounds for this girl 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Needs better screen
customer_reviews.text: Works just like any other reusable K-cup filter, very simple to use. Only draw back is that the screen that filters the grinds doesn't prevent all the extra coffee oil and grinds from getting in your cup. So you always have a think paste at the bottom and chunks in your coffee. Not a huge issue as long as you avoid drinking the very last sip of your coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Calitri

customer_reviews.title: Very good p
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, works great with my Keurig Elite. Much better than Walmart or supermarket refillable pods. Great for creating your own blend of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Fedfan

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use and save the plastic K-cups. This is a much more environmentally Friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Osborne

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC FOR KEURIG!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, as I don't have to remove the existing K-cup holder to put this one in. Easy to use, easy to remove & easy to wash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: No more expensive kcups!
customer_reviews.text: So far works great! I’m looking forward to saving money by not having to buy anymore kcups and just getting the coffee grounds. I gently wash it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: XiAri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected. I’ve always used reusable pods and needed to replace the ones I’ve had for a few years. And these fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Save money!
customer_reviews.text: I still prefer a pot of brewed coffee for the flavor. These refillable K-cups make sense. No plastic in the landfill. Save money by purchasing bulk coffee and filling the cup before you brew. Why buy overpriced Keurig pods?
customer_reviews.author: marti carlson

customer_reviews.title: Efficient & cleans VERY well
customer_reviews.text: It cleans VERY well, it's sturdy and works great. My old ones needed tapping with additional manual scooping to get the old grinds out right after brewing. With these, I just open the top and it all slides out perfectly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lana0021

customer_reviews.title: Weak coffee
customer_reviews.text: While this product sounds great my coffee is weak when using it and I don’t know why. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Tops fall off eventually
customer_reviews.text: These work great if you want something like ground coffee or tea! My one complaint is that the tops usually fall off after 2 dozen runs through the dishwasher to clean them. Other than that good product!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: Mom loved them fit perfectly in her Keurig Classic ..make sure u check fitment before purchasing , as not all are the same...ok maybe some ...
customer_reviews.author: harith abdulmajid

customer_reviews.text: These work SO GREAT!!! I like that 4 come in the package but honestly we’ve had them for 6 months and are still using our first one. We just wash it every couple of days and it’s good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Keurig, fits without adapting the coffee maker, use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, just wash and air dry. Refill, with your favorite coffee(s) and store in an airtight container for a quick cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Fire

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising
customer_reviews.text: These cups did not fit my coffee maker even though they were advertised as compatible with my machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Corder

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I use for my loose leaves for tea. Fits great in my machine and easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit K-Mini.  Advertisement lists K-Mini, when product arrived did not list K-Mini.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit K-Mini. So is useless to me. Very disappointed. No return policy, so am stuck with useless product. I specifically looked for pods that listed K-Mini. This product did and so I ordered it. They do not fit K-Mini. And no refund. Do not purchase if you have a K-Mini.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Low reviews correct.
customer_reviews.text: Found out the low reviews were correct. The area of mesh is too large and the water creates a tunnel straight thru the top of the pod to your cup. Makes very week coffee. A total waste.
customer_reviews.author: go4trout

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! I save so much money on coffee. Plus helps to cut down on plastic waste. Help keep our oceans clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these filters.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my filters. They are very easy to use. Make sure when you close the lid that there are no grounds near the hinge or the lid won't close. They make a nice cup of coffee. They are also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly flynn

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product, for me it's easier to enjoy your coffee. Those coffee pods was very expensive and the one that was on sale all the time was the flavor kind. I tried to load pictures of the product but for some reason is not loading up. To anyone who's interesting to save some money when drinking coffee these products for your k classic are the best.
customer_reviews.author: regina thompson

customer_reviews.title: They Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy bulk tea and coffee. These little k-cups are easy to use, to clean and makes a wonderful cup of tea or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: K-cup that is compatible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a k-cup that works with Keurig! I've bought several different ones for 2 different models of Keurig and nothing...but these did work with my k-select! yay!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for using different coffee in my machine...especially when you want to blend coffee... awesome product..
customer_reviews.author: marisol Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use these if and when I run out of pods. They work better than any I have used!
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Great for making my own coffee without the expensive kcups.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: If you like drinking your coffee grounds...
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible. I followed all instructions and had a cup full of coffee grounds. Tried it again to see if it was a fluke and it did it again. Took me longer to clean out my Keurig of grounds then it did to just make coffee. Never using again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Keurig 2.0
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Keurig 2.0 I want my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shiro inu

customer_reviews.title: Not a correct single cup coffee kcup
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't described by the seller correctly and it doesn't work properly with my machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my classic keurig machine. I also bought kcup natural paper filters which makes cleanup super easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my older model K70, reasonably priced. With 4 of them, I fill them all the night before so they are ready 1st thing in the morning (like regular k-cups) and wash/aid dry them during the day. just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tech_Freak

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with K-Compact
customer_reviews.text: Nope, in spite of the description, it does not work with the K-Compact. And, funnily enough, it does not say compatable with K-Compact on the box that arrived either. Nope, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my new Keurig K compact since the one I had didn’t fit (was super old anyway). Easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: swarfield

customer_reviews.title: saves money
customer_reviews.text: You may have to widen the opening where the water is injected in the top in order for the injector to clear the edges. Easy to do, but, not everyone has the patience for modifying something like that.
customer_reviews.author: VBowers

customer_reviews.title: dump the k-cups
customer_reviews.text: These are great....use them all the time with the coffee I want...I also use the paper filters for these too
customer_reviews.author: z-man

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the K-mini
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit the K-Mini despite the seller's description. This item is apparently non-returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary N. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable k-cup filters. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. So far they stay seal and no coffee grounds in your coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Works Well with Keurig K75 (B70)
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Keurig K75 (B70). I alternate between two k-cups to prolong their use. I also wash and dry them after each use to prevent coffee staining and grinds getting stuck in the mesh. Will buy more if these start to wear down.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dislike is how the latch/Top of these can tear off easily and will wear out quickly if you use it every day. But the fact they give you four pieces and the price that you can get these for makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeMesa

customer_reviews.title: Work just like they should!
customer_reviews.text: They do their job and they are environmentally friendly! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Sckzfisher

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good idea but it makes coffee taste horrible.
customer_reviews.author: V Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Works great in many quick brew coffee makers
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups you can blend and use your own coffee and it saves LOTS of money on K Cups
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Feltham

customer_reviews.title: savings
customer_reviews.text: great product to use your own coffee. saves money, not buying the pods, easy to clean, also dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the reusable K-Cup filters a couple months ago. I'm happy enough, seems to do the trick. The taste is fine but to be fair I'm not a coffee snob so I'm not looking for the perfect cup of coffee. The main reason I purchased these reusable filters is to save money and for that it definitely does!
customer_reviews.author: Across the Pond

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are so easy to use. I keep two filled at all times so they are ready to go. I have used the same two since I bought them so they are very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Williams

customer_reviews.title: Over 2 years with these reusable K Cups!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for 2.5 years and the tops have broken off of 3/4 of them within the last 6 months. They still seal even though the hinge is broken and I am back to order more so I can replace the broken ones since I know they easily last 2 years of daily use. This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four to a pack!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and came four to a box which is nice when more than one person needs to make a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the brand and works the same. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They fit right in the k cup holder. Easy to clean and very durable. Would definitely recommend. Great product for the loose tea leaves we are using now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Takes the guesswork out of which personal kcup to use with your Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: shimmygirl

customer_reviews.title: A great price saver for coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect and allows you to purchase large bags of coffee grounds which are much cheaper then the K cup pods.
customer_reviews.author: T Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cup works but not worth the trouble to load. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cup works but not worth the trouble to load. Cost saving is outweighed by the cups inefficient filtering. Sludge in bottom of my coffee cup.... please, no. I reuse k cup twice to save money. The usually give enough flavor to trick my mind.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn f.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. But the flavor isn’t as good as a regular pod.
customer_reviews.author: imlilsis

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable K-Cup filters!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. What a way to save money by using your own coffee. They pay for themselves in just a few uses. Also, you dont have to explain to ppl how to place them. I've had friends puncture other one by just putting them in without making sure they wont be puntcured. No need to worry with these.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Davenport

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - better than other ones I bought. They will last.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Penta

customer_reviews.title: Pack of 4.  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over 6 months now. All four are still working and being used. Expect one day the plastic holding on top will break. Then will buy another pack.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: They work with no problem and very easy to handle and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, easy to use and good quality product. We received a day before original date. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: darryl

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok to use when you run out of real orig pods
customer_reviews.author: John Wachli

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy to Clean, Effective, Environmentally Sound
customer_reviews.text: We love these and use them to avoid buying and throwing away one-time plastic K-cups. The coffee is WAY better this way, with better acid balance, flavor and mouth feel. The 4-pack is perfect for a 2-person household, as there's always a clean one available while the others may be drying (or awaiting the House Elf to wash them). :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little reusable k-cups. I can use a variety of my favorite coffees and teas in them. They clean up quickly and are easy to use and I feel good about not creating plastic garbage that the disposable ones create. Saves money too.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Mesh is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Very sturdy, easy to use. Fits perfect. Mesh is sturdy doesn’t rip apart like my last one.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great in my Keurig K-Select, I thought it might not work and I just bought it anyways. Glad I did! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Usam

customer_reviews.title: Great Recycle Item!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use when the K-Cups are depleted from your cupboard and you can fill & refill with your own ground coffee. Best to empty coffee grinds in the trash as opposed to the sink drain, which is recommended to help not clog the pipes
customer_reviews.author: DENISE BEACH

product_meta.title: Reusable K-cup Filter for Keurig K-Select, K-Elite, K-Classic, K-Latte, K-Compact, B40, B41, B45, B50, B55, B60, B65, B66, B70, B71, B75, B76, B77, B79-4 Pack by Brewslang
product_meta.description:
Brewslang - Our language is coffee! 


Java Cup 2.0 

 *  Use your favorite coffee with most Keurig Single Cup Brewers and save up to 80% vs. K-cup Coffee Packs 
 *  Eco friendly and 100% BPA, DEHP, LEAD free– Attachable cap allows for easy cleaning
 *  Easy to use: Insert Java cup 1.0 in you Keurig brewer - Fill with your favorite coffee and Brew!


Retail package contains  *  1 Brewslang Java Cup 1.0
 *  1 Brewslang coffee scoop


Thank you for using Brewslang Premium Quality Products
feature_bullets: ► BREW YOUR FAVORITE COFFEE - The Brewslang reusable KCup filter will work perfectly with your Keurig 1.0 single cup brewer without giving you any error codes (no modification needed). Lower your costs by saving up to 80% compared to using k-cup portion packs. Double your value and increase your personal choices of coffee and tea

► DURABLE AND EASY TO USE - Designed for longevity and effective functionality, our reusable KCup is made from top quality 18/8 stainless steel micromesh filter to ensure top quality design. Lid with silicone O-Ring for a snug fit, built with plastic resistant to high temperatures

► ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - 100% BPA, LEAD, DEHP Free, Dishwasher safe (top shelf) - Provides a cost effective way of brewing your favorite coffee while saving the environment. Reduce the number of prefilled portion pack cups thrown into the garbage
► LIFETIME GUARANTEE - If for any reason you are not happy with your purchase we will issue a full refund (no questions asked) - Retail package includes: (4) Java Cups

► KEURIG COMPATIBILITY - K-Select, K-Elite, K-Classic, K-Latte, K-Compact, B40, B41, B45, B50, B55, B60, B65, B66, B70, B71, B75, B76, B77, B79, B140, B145, B150, B155 - K40, K45, K50, K55, K60, K65, K70, K71, K75, K76, K77, K79, Brewers made after 08/2007: Elite, Classic, Ultra, Special Edition, Ultimate & Platinum
